v8:item.v8:content: Documents of inventory shipment to third party companies
Document discount (markup) will be of the selected kind
Products and services item costs added to the document table will be of the selected type
Counterparty contract under which the document is issued
Goods order according to which the inventory is shipped
The field can be used to specify any additional information related to the document
Information about counterparty where the inventory is shipped to
Type of VAT taxation for the sale of goods and services
If the flag is set, then VAT will be included to cost when posting
Own company under the name of which the document is produced
Information about employee responsible for entering current document
Structural unit from which the inventory is written off
When the check box is selected, VAT will be included in the amount of document
Cell of the structural unit (stack, section) which the inventories are written off from
List of inventory, expenses of which is displayed by document
Inventory char position, expense of which is displayed by the current document
If necessary, the inventory characteristic is set in the given field
Unit of measurement of the products and services item
Price of the items position which is to be sold (shipped)
Cost of products and services by this row which is to be realized (shipped)
AutoFilled fields by the total inventory costs, according to the price and currency settings
Order by which the inventory is shipped (shipped)
Automatic discount or markup percent for line in the receipt.
Total amount of all automatic discounts for receipt row calculated according to mutual influence rules.
Identifier for linking Products table row and Discounts (markups) table row. Automatically generated, not edited by user.
Document, on the basis of which the prepayment was received
Goods order according to which the prepayment was received
Amount of the advance payment in the currency of settlements with counterparty
Currency exchange rate of the settlements with counterparty
Amount of prepayment in the currency of payment
Identifier for linking Products table row and Discounts (markups) table row. Automatically generated, not edited by user.
Discount (markup) that applies to the order
(not used) Invoice (fill in the CCD numbers)
